results.name: a(n) = A328578(n) - A257993(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
xref: Cf. A257993, A276086, A328578, A328585 (positions of zeros), A328587 (of negative terms), A328588 (of positive terms).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 21 2019
